title: TechStore E-Commerce Platform
description:
- Developed a full-stack application to ensure an end-to-end software engineering lifecycle within a 1-month period.
- Implemented secure multi-component architecture with JWT authentication, RESTful API development, and MySQL database integration.
- Applied best practices in modular code structure, user authentication, and data management for scalable deployment.

title: Disaster Management Control Grid
description:
- Built a data-driven dashboard for real-time disaster response and resource allocation.
- Applied analytical modeling and data interpretation to live incident data using Pandas and Data Visualization.
- Derived actionable technical insights from complex datasets for decision support.
- Automated alerting and reporting for rapid decision-making during disaster events.
